==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|せい|い|たい|しょう|ぐん|yomi=o}}

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|[seii taiɕoːɡun]|lang=ja}}

===Etymology===
/seii taisyaugun/ > /seii taisyoːgun/. Literally "great general who subdues eastern barbarians".

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|せい.い たいしょうぐん|hhira=せいいたいしやうぐん}}

# during Japanese [[w:Nara period|Nara]] and [[w:Heian period|Heian]] periods, a military commander sent to subdue the [[蝦夷|Emishi]]
# during the Japanese [[w:Nara period|Kamakura]], [[w:Nara period|Muromachi]] and [[w:Nara period|Edo]] periods, the hereditary chief executive of a [[w:Shogun|shogunate government]]; a [[shōgun]]
